SoftShellWeb: Host in Taiwan (or Amsterdam), Plant Some Trees! (1GB KVM from $25/year)

amsterdam, green hosting, kvm, netherlands, softshellweb, taiwan, VPS March 31, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

We saw SoftShellWeb most recently back on December 23, 2020.  They’re a UK company that offers hosting in Amsterdam and Taiwan.  The first is common – the latter definitely is not!

In their last post (and the one before it), they shared some pics of their office, which was pretty cool, and we’ve discussed their green hosting initiative in the past.  For every month you have service, they plant a tree through the Eden Reforestation Project.

So with hosting in semi-exotic locales and green hosting initiatives, not to mention a well-decorated office, SoftShellWeb is not your run-of-the-mill hosting company and deserves a look.

Their WHOIS is public. They are registered in the UK. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept PayPal, Alipay, Debit/Credit Card, BitCoin, UnionPay, WebMoney, Moneta, QIWI, India Netbanking, iDeal, SOFORT Banking, DOKU, DragonPay, Boleto, Banco do Brasil, Alfa-Click, Malaysia e-banking, Pago Fácil, Rapi Pago, Red Pagos, and Bancontact.

Here’s a little about SoftShellWeb in their own words:

“SoftShellWeb is a professional web hosting provider and experienced data center operator. Since 2019 the company has provided private and business clients with high-performance hosting products as well as the necessary infrastructure for efficient operation of websites. A combination of stable technology, attractive pricing and flexible support and services has enabled SoftShellWeb to continuously strengthen its market position both nationally and internationally. SoftShellWeb stands for high-quality and fast hardware in conjunction with an outstanding price-performance ratio with the support of a competent, in-house service team. We have set up an exceptional team that offers innovative, top-quality service. They support our clients on a daily basis and work to develop the technologies of tomorrow. We focus on human values. We believe in collective effort: the complexity of our businesses requires a wide range of skills. We have great confidence in our employees’ talents.

At SoftShellWeb we have been providing quality services in three locations on three different contients since 2019. We have started our spring cleaning sale and its time to offer some amazing special offers to the community that has helped us grow and expand our services. In 2020 we realized that our clients require more bandwidth then the average consumer, therefore we have increased the bandiwth with the current special offer. In amsterdam we have set a soft limit of 50 or 100 Mbit after the the cap is reached. We hope that you will enjoy our limited quantity special offers and we are always open to suggestions to improve and adapt to our clients requirements.”

If you have been a customer of SoftShellWeb or you give them a try out now, please comment below.

Now read more to see the offers!
